description: Enjoy privacy, comfort, and lovely views in this Whistler-style home backing onto a peaceful greenbelt. Large south-facing windows fill the space with natural light and showcase valley viewsâ€”perfect for morning coffee in the bedroom or relaxing on the spacious deck.
